name: teemii
tagline: A simple team task board for managing work progress
description: Teemii is a self-hosted team and project management board with tasks, statuses, and collaboration features. It provides a simple, responsive web UI for managing workloads and progress across teams.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Organize work into projects with customizable boards for different teams or initiatives

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create and assign tasks with descriptions, due dates, and priority levels for clear accountability

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Work together with team members on shared projects with real-time updates and notifications

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access project boards from desktop, tablet, or mobile devices with a fully responsive interface

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: View project progress at a glance with visual indicators and completion percentages
